thread.title: ニューヨークで雄牛が食肉処理場から脱走 警察が大追跡（画像・動画）
thread.title_full: ニューヨークで雄牛が食肉処理場から脱走 警察が大追跡（画像・動画）

author: Kazuhiko Kuze
title: ニューヨークで雄牛が食肉処理場から脱走 警察が大追跡（画像・動画）
text:   Unknown persons and a policeman usher an escaped cow onto a truck on the streets of central Lausanne May 18, 2007. The cow escaped during transportation and covered many kilometres from the countryside to the city centre causing mild disruption. She was eventually shot with a tranquilizer dart, restrained in a busy crossroad and collected by her farmer. REUTERS/Denis Balibouse (SWITZERLAND) Unknown persons restrain an escaped cow on the streets of central Lausanne May 18, 2007. The cow escaped during transportation and covered many kilometres from the countryside to the city centre causing mild disruption. She was eventually shot with a tranquilizer dart, restrained in a busy crossroad and collected by her farmer. REUTERS/Denis Balibouse (SWITZERLAND) An escaped cow runs loose on the streets of central Lausanne May 18, 2007. The cow escaped during tranportation and covered many kilometres from the countryside to the city centre causing mild disruption. She was eventually shot with a tranquilizer dart, restrained in a busy crossroad and collected by her farmer. REUTERS/Denis Balibouse (SWITZERLAND) An escaped cow runs loose on the streets of central Lausanne May 18, 2007. The cow escaped during tranportation and covered many kilometres from the countryside to the city centre causing mild disruption. She was eventually shot with a tranquilizer dart, restrained in a busy crossroad and collected by her farmer. REUTERS/Denis Balibouse (SWITZERLAND) An escaped cow runs loose on the streets of central Lausanne May 18, 2007. The cow escaped during tranportation and covered many kilometres from the countryside to the city centre causing mild disruption. She was eventually shot with a tranquilizer dart, restrained in a busy crossroad and collected by her farmer. REUTERS/Denis Balibouse (SWITZERLAND) An escaped cow stands in a garden in central Lausanne May 18, 2007. The cow escaped during tranportation and covered many kilometres from the countryside to the city centre causing mild disruption. She was eventually shot with a tranquilizer dart, restrained in a busy crossroad and collected by her farmer. REUTERS/Denis Balibouse (SWITZERLAND) An escaped cow heads towards a local policeman in the streets of central Lausanne May 18, 2007. The cow escaped during tranportation and covered many kilometres from the countryside to the city centre causing mild disruption. She was eventually shot with a tranquilizer dart, restrained in a busy crossroad and collected by her farmer. REUTERS/Denis Balibouse (SWITZERLAND) A Swiss policeman observes an escaped cow standing in a garden in central Lausanne May 18, 2007. The cow escaped during tranportation and covered many kilometres from the countryside to the city centre causing mild disruption. She was eventually shot with a tranquilizer dart, restrained in a busy crossroad and collected by her farmer. REUTERS/Denis Balibouse (SWITZERLAND) An escaped cow runs loose on the streets of central Lausanne May 17,2007. The cow escaped during tranportation and covered many kilometres from the countryside to the city centre causing mild disruption. She was eventually shot with a tranquilizer dart, restrained in a busy crossroad and collected by her farmer. REUTERS/Denis Balibouse (SWITZERLAND) A Swiss police officer follows an escaped cow running on the loose on the streets of central Lausanne May 17,2007. The cow escaped during tranportation and covered many kilometres from the countryside to the city centre causing mild disruption. She was eventually shot with a tranquilizer dart, restrained in a busy crossroad and collected by her farmer. REUTERS/Denis Balibouse (SWITZERLAND) An escaped cow is tied inside the back of a truck in central Lausanne May 18, 2007. The cow escaped during transportation and covered many kilometres from the countryside to the city centre causing mild disruption. She was eventually shot with a tranquilizer dart, restrained in a busy crossroad and collected by her farmer. REUTERS/Denis Balibouse (SWITZERLAND)  シェア
